summary: In 1999, a voice actor moves from Il Mare, a seaside house, and she leaves a Xmas card in its (magical) mailbox. He, an architect student, receives it in 1997, and so begins a friendship separated by 2 years.
cast: Jung-jae Lee|Jun Ji-Hyun|Mu-saeng Kim|Seung-yeon Jo|Yun-jae Min|Yun-Yeong Choe|So-yeong Hong|Jung-Hee Nam
keywords: stray dog|radio performer|reference to m.c. escher|house on stilts|voice over letter
title: Siworae
